name: Marilyn Honig- Coffee, Cults and Crafts

episodes.title: Shiny Frightened Children: Live Chat with Lindsey Williams
episodes.description: Join Marilyn, Peggie and Lindsey Williams (featured in the documentary Shiny Happy People) for a candid chat about fear mongering and control tactics used on children by extreme Fundamentalist groups.

episodes.title: SPTV: Let's Talk, Heal and Move On
Marlene Sweeney: Anatomy of a Cult Leader
Cult Recovery Talk with Jeff (PTS for Life) and Marilyn (Coffee, Cults and Crafts)
episodes.description: Join Jeff and Marilyn for an open discussion about their journeys in cult recovery. Jeff is an Ex Scientologist and Marilyn is Ex Fundamental Pentecostal/IBLP. They will be comparing similarities and differences in their path to recovering from the influence of high control groups.

episodes.title: Morning Musings: Scientology- Stop the Abuse!
episodes.description:
Please sign and share this petition, to help spread the word about the abuses of Scientology!

episodes.title: Morning Musings: Cults and Chronic Illness- The Mind/Body Connection
Haley Honig Mielenz: From Cult Kid to Free Thinker
episodes.description: Join me as I interview one of the most important people in my life; my own precious daughter. Haley's journey from being born in a cult to finding freedom is heartbreaking but also very inspiring. She is an example of resilience and beauty.

episodes.title: Cults of the World with Liz Gale
Live Chat with Relatable Reese and Marilyn Honig
Diamond Way: A Conversation with Jo, a Survivor (Part 1)
episodes.description:
This Part 1 of Jo's story, who as a young 18 year old, got involved in Diamond Way, a group claiming to be Buddhist. She found that this group was not what they had seemed at all, and not consistent with Buddhist teachings and values. This is one of several accounts of the practices of this controverial group and its leader, Ole Nydahl, by former members of Diamond Way. 

Part 2 of Jo's Story:
https://www.youtube.com/live/uFiIUKxPHpE?si=HEwpqaqBbtWYwy0g

episodes.title: Bill Gothard and The IBLP
episodes.description: Join Marilyn, Clearwater Chad, and special guest Peggie Brott as we deep dive into the IBLP, the fundamental Christian organization, the IBLP

episodes.title: The Cult Leaders Toolbox Episode 5 Authoritarian Leadership
Deep Dive: The Buddhafield Cult with special guest Kelli Copter
episodes.description: Join Marilyn, Chad and special guest Kelli Copter as they discuss Buddhafield, a cult led by a mysterious leader in a Speedo. They will explore the tactics and practices of Michel Rostand, and how he captivated his young followers using love bombing and promises of spiritual enlightenment.

episodes.title: Our Emotional Brain Chemistry- What Makes Us Tick
episodes.description:
Duncan discusses "Our Emotional Brain Chemistry- What Makes Us Tick?" 
The 5 senses connect us with the outside world.
Emotions connect us with our inside world- how we feel.

There are four main hormones: D.O.S.E.
DOPAMINE- 'Feel Good' - short term rewards; addictive. E.g. keeps you checking your phone for likes, hits, wins. Achieve big goals one step at a time.
OXYTOCIN- 'Hug Drug' - social; love and affection, touch, sex, laughter, music. 
- longer term, build relationships, deep thought, healing, calm and safety.
SEROTONIN- 'Achievement' - balances mood, motivates status, pride, loyalty, recognition, appreciation. 
- motivates leaders to lead, followers to follow, not wanting to let people down.
ENDORPHINS- 'Runner's High' - natural pain killer, helps deal with stress.
-released by exercise, outdoor activity, etc.

episodes.title: The Cult Leaders Toolbox Episode 4 The Love Bomb
2nd Gen Moms Breaking The Cycle
episodes.description: Join Elysia (Degraded Daughters of Dianetics) and Marilyn (Coffee, Cults and Crafts) as they share their thoughts, experiences, and hearts on being a Mom recovering from cult abuse, while raising their children to be happy, healthy, free thinkers!

episodes.title: Cult Leaders Toolbox Episode 3 Losing Your Identity 2
A Look Inside Heaven's Gate with Vanessa, Marilyn and Chad
episodes.description:
On March 26, 1997, thirty-nine members of the Heaven's Gate cult took their own lives, believing they would transcend to "higher beings" by spaceship. 
Join Vanessa (DDD), Marilyn (CCC) and Clearwater Chad as we discuss the origins, events, and traits of this mysterious UFO cult.
